The Smarter Web Company announces that 510,368 Ordinary Shares have been placed in accordance with the terms of the Subscription Agreement announced on 24 December 2025.

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

text:
As we are now on the Main Market of the London Stock Exchange and the shares are more accessible for people we are looking to update the website share dealing information page with more brokers that people can use.

Could people please reply to this message in the comments section below for any broker they are using (not already on the page) so we can update the list for UK, EU and US.

We also want to know if people in Asia, Australia, Canada are able to purchase our stock and if so via what brokers/platforms?

We can then update the website to reflect this.

Thank you as always to everyone in the community.

You can view the share dealing information page here: smarterwebcompany.co.uk/shar…

We will recap SWC's uplisting to the London Stock Exchange last week & discuss all things SWC at this exciting time for the company.

Livestreaming on Twitter and YouTube.

text:
New Speaker Announcement: Bitcoin treasuries unconference UK

We are delighted to announce that @phongle, CEO of @MicroStrategy, has joined the speaker line-up for the Bitcoin Treasuries Unconference UK.

This event delivers focused Bitcoin content, featuring perspectives from those actively shaping the Bitcoin treasury landscape. An event that brings together insight, conversation, and connection around the evolving role of Bitcoin as digital capital.

The UK’s leading Bitcoin treasury event, brought to you in partnership by The Smarter Web Company and the Bitcoin Treasuries Media team.

Find out more or buy tickets using the link in the comments.

text:
RNS Announcement: First Day of Dealings

The Smarter Web Company is pleased to announce that the admission of its entire share capital, being 350,237,093 ordinary shares of £0.001 each, to the Equity Shares (Commercial Companies) category of the UK Financial Conduct Authority’s Official List and the commencement of trading on the London Stock Exchange’s Main Market for listed securities will take place at 8:00 a.m. today.

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

LSE: #SWC | OTCQB: $TSWCF | FRA: $3M8

text:
On Tuesday 3 February, we’re looking forward to opening the day’s trading for The Smarter Web Company on the Main Market of the London Stock Exchange.

Thank you to everyone who registered for our informal drinks reception that evening.

We’ve just emailed venue details, and the event has been extended to run from 19:00 to 22:00.

@asjwebley, @Croesus_BTC, and the wider team look forward to seeing you there.
